message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $11,500. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about we try $10,750? I really think this product would be a great fit for me.
